title: 'Where dead men lie': spotlight the director
creator_credit: Graham Chase, Chris McGill, Richard Mason and Film Australia
brief_description: Based on the production of “Where dead men lie”, highlighting the role of the director, Keith Gow. This film shows his involvement in screen testing, location shooting, editing and mixing. Suitable for Years 7-12.
